basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Robin Lacy Endowed Scholarship in Industrial Safety
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Robin Lacy Endowed Scholarship in Indus

description: To provide scholarship assistance to students majoring in Industrial or Occupational Safety. Eligibility Requirements Major in Industrial or Occupational Safety Minimum GPA of 3.0 Student member of the American Society of Safety Engineers, National/Oklahoma Safety Council and /or Mid-Continent Exploration & Production Safety Network Personal statement demonstrating how the student will pay it forward as part of the professional safety community Demonstrate financial need Preference to non-traditional students Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
